text: IFK Norrköping is an association football club in the town of Norrköping in Sweden. The team has played several Allsvenskan seasons. The club has won the Swedish national championship in 1942–43, 1944–45, 1945–46, 1946–47, 1947–48, 1951–52, 1955–56, 1956–57, 1960, 1962, 1963, 1989 and 2015. ==References== == Other websites == * IFK Norrköping (official website) Category:Swedish football clubs Category:Norrköping Category:1897 establishments in Sweden
title: IFK Norrköping
